properties.description: Daily number of backend queries per endpoint.

activities.name: GetFiles
activities.description: Get files to be processed from Cosmos.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
a.filepath(1) as [filename], 
a.filepath() as [filepath]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwQueryOperation/Parquet/*.*.parquet',FORMAT = 'PARQUET')
as [a]
WHERE    
datediff(day,cast(a.filepath(1) as datetime), convert(date,getutcdate())) <= @{pipeline().parameters.ParameterNumberOfDays}

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterates through the cosmos files of interest.

activities.name: ProcessNumberofQueries
activities.description: Process one daily number of queries file.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
with all_queries as
(
SELECT DISTINCT
	substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
	[SubscriptionId_DT_String] AS [SubscriptionId], 
	[LogicalServerName_DT_String] AS [Endpoint],
	CAST([originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] as date) as [currentDay],
	[distributed_statement_id_DT_String] as [DistributedStatementId]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
       '@{item().filepath}',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200),
	[originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] datetime2,
	distributed_statement_id_DT_String varchar(50),
	[eventName_DT_String] varchar(200)
)
	AS [b]
WHERE [eventName_DT_String] = 'vdw_distributed_computation_rpc' and [ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%'
)
select
[Region],[SubscriptionId],[Endpoint],[currentDay],count(distinct [DistributedStatementId]) as numOfQueries
from all_queries
group by [Region],[SubscriptionId],[Endpoint],[currentDay]
